articles.title: Samsung Level U2 Neckband Earbuds Launched With 12mm Drivers, 18 Hours Music Playback - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Samsung Level U2 neckband earbuds have been launched. The new model comes over five years after the launch of the original Level U. The Samsung Level U2 are designed to deliver up to 18 hours of continuous music playback on a single charge.
articles.content: Samsung Level U2 have been unveiled as the company's latest neckband-style wireless earbuds. The new model comes over five years after the launch of the original Level U that debuted back in July 201… [+1970 chars]
